item.title: Version 0.2.9
item.description:
Ora Browser v0.2.9

Changes since last release:

Features

  • feat: enable passkeys — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • feat: add URL handling and deep linking support (#132) — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • feat: double click full resize of window (#128) — Chase
  • feat: add ability to edit container name and emoji (#125) — Chase
  • feat: add JavaScript alert, confirm, and prompt handling (#108) — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Feature/global tracker for sidebar (#98) — AryanRogye
  • Feature: allow middle click to open link in new tab (#88) — Omar Sánchez
  • feat: implement window system with private browsing and storage isolation (#80) — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • feat: add media bar (#57) — Roman Potapov
  • feat: update build-release.sh — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • feat: per-container storage isolation (#79) — Kenenisa Alemayehu

Fixes

  • fix: adjust indentation in build-release.sh for consistent formatting — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • fix: settings model container and spaces UI (#127) — Chase
  • fix: move to container shows proper containers now (#126) — Chase
  • fix(sidebar): update sidebar visibility persistance (#124) — Furkan Koseoglu
  • fix: update user agent string in TabScriptHandler for compatibility — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • fix: prevent appearance update crash when NSApp is nil (#115) — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • fix(tabs): add keyboard shortcuts for tab selection and notification handling (#106) — Furkan Koseoglu
  • fix: closing tab animation (#53) — Roman Potapov
  • fix(sidebar): fixes sidebar behavior with downloads widgets when side… (#100) — Furkan Koseoglu
  • fix: mini player spacing on sidebar — yonaries
  • fix: min and max launcher width — yonaries
  • fix: update favicon fetching URLs to include Google favicon service — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Fix inconsistent spacings, paddings and corner radiuses (#81) — Yonathan Dejene
  • Fix copy URL bug - closure capture issue (#86) — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • fix: make History.container optional by initializing it to nil — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • fix: searching for text in url bar (#85) — Roman Potapov

Chores

  • chore: swiftlint — yonaries
  • chore: skip version bump commits in release script — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • chore: update .gitignore to exclude backup files and remove obsolete appcast.xml.backup — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • chore: remove unnecessary exit statement from release script — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • chore: Enhance release script with changelog generation and HTML export — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • chore: undo to vertical scrollview — yonaries
  • chore!: bump deployment target to macOS 15 — yonaries
  • chore: reduce urlbar spacing — yonaries
  • chore: format files — yonaries
  • chore: update .gitignore to include project.yml.bak — Kenenisa Alemayehu

Other

  • Enhance Tab Management Settings and UI (#139) — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Update macOS and License badge in README — Yonathan Dejene
  • Change license from MIT to GPL-2.0 — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Delete LICENSE.md — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Add GNU General Public License v2 — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Prevent Window Drag Interference During Tab Drags and Refactor TabManager for Modularity (#101) — AryanRogye
  • ux: Cleanup search engines implementation (#121) — versecafe
  • ux: Improve page finder (#122) — versecafe
  • Add custom keyboard shortcut support + update UI (#89) — Joe McLaughlin
  • Add horizontal padding to search bar in LauncherMain SwiftUI view (#110) — FormalSnake
  • Update Wiki link in README.md (#104) — Aether
  • Update Wiki link to point to GitHub page — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • ui: apply concentric rectangle on tabs — yonaries
  • Add new Shape that conditionally uses ConcentricRectangle on 26+ (#83) — Joe McLaughlin
  • refactor: moved sidbar urlbar to container view — yonaries
  • Sidebar Fixes (UX) (#59) — Aarav Gupta
  • backport: WindowDragGesture to macOS 14 (#68) — Aarav Gupta
  • Remove codesigning verification steps from build-release.sh to streamline the build process. — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Add checklist for including screenshots in PRs — Yonathan Dejene
  • Enhance build-release.sh with environment variable loading and security checks — Kenenisa Alemayehu
